messages.subject: Prayer Request
messages.msgSnippet: Hello to everyone:  My name is Renee and I homeschool my 4 children.  I have two disabiling conditions that prevent me from working.  I have been trying to get
messages.messageBody:
Hello to everyone: My name is Renee and I homeschool my 4 children. I have two disabiling
conditions that prevent me from working. I have been trying to get Disability for a year now and
have been turned down twice. I have finally had to get an attorney and I have a court date on May
4th. I ask humbly that all of you who will please cover me in prayer, especially on that day.
This is such an important thing to our family. We really need the money. I thank you for
allowing this post and for your prayers.


=====
Renee S.
(Blessed Moma to Ryan 16, Austin 13, Carson 11 and Jessica Renee 5 1/2. (Matthew and Ethan already safe in the Arms of Jesus.)

__________________________________________________
